text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.title: Auto Elytra Panic Configuration
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.p: The minimum Fall Distance before checking for activation
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.f: The pitch to be looking when active
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.a: The yaw amount added between each Game Tick to make you spin
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.r: If you want to restore the Yaw and Pitch before the mod changes it on deactivate
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.c: If you want the mod to send a message in the chat when it activates
